archimate:Requirement.name: AS.2.2.6g: g) restrictions on the audit team (e.g. special processing routines that must not be run or business applications, systems and networks that must not be accessed).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
